articles.title: Official Weigh-In Results | UFC Perth - UFC.com
articles.description: The Official Weights Of The Fighters Competing At UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs Reyes, Live From Perth, Western Australia On September 27
articles.content: This weekend, the Octagon returns to RAC Arena for the fourth time as a loaded fight night event touches down in the Western Australia capital. Headlined by a critical matchup of light heavyweight co… [+1886 chars]
